body_html:
I'm not a contributer or lawyer, but:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/LICENSE

Maybe this can be the "letter"?

It's an apache license, which means you can basically use it (also commercially), you can redistribute it, modify it and are not required to publish your changes or your source code.

https://tldrlegal.com/license/apache-license-2.0-(apache-2.0)

body:
I'm not a contributer or lawyer, but:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/LICENSE

Maybe this can be the "letter"?

It's an apache license, which means you can basically use it (also commercially), you can redistribute it, modify it and are not required to publish your changes or your source code.

https://tldrlegal.com/license/apache-license-2.0-(apache-2.0)
